entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 51 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
